Header: Army Woman Soldier in DSAC Produces New Game Record
Content: Track and field events in the 10th Defence Services Athletics Championship - 2018 (DSAC) started on Tuesday (13) at Sugathadasa Stadium, Colombo 13. During today’s events, Private H.D.V Lakshani of the Sri Lanka Army Women’s Corps by marking 13.58 meters made a new game record in the women’s Triple Jump event. The championship tournament will continue until Sunday (16) to culminate with the closing ceremony. Major General Damapath Fernando, Chief of Staff is scheduled to participate in the closing event as the Chief Guest.
